item.title: Fix Screen Tearing In XFCE On AMD GPUs
item.description: Screen tearing is still a common issue on Linux, more so on the XFCE desktop environment. Resolving it is fairly straight forward however can be hard to find the correct solution online as many tutorials tell you to do stuff like disable the composer which doesn’t need to be done. Screen tearing can be fixed with this one simple command xfconf-query -c xfwm4 -p /general/vblank_mode -t string -s "glx" --create And then reboot.
